name: Plumber and Pipes
description:
To all puzzle solving lovers out there, this game is for you! Play as a young plumber on his way to repair pipelines. Someone needs to get that water flowing. You will be able to rotate pipes in order to achieve this goal, creating complex and solid pipelines leading from the source of the water to your given objective. Make good use of the valves in your levels. Now get to it!
Plumber & Pipes is a game that tests speed-logic. Control your stress and build as many pipes as you can!

CARACTERISTICS
- Puzzle Game
- Survival
- Timer
